# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(nsweb LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang++")
add_executable(nsweb "")
set_target_properties(nsweb PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "nsweb")
set_target_properties(nsweb PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
target_include_directories(nsweb PRIVATE
    /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu
)
target_compile_options(nsweb PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(nsweb PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(nsweb PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(nsweb PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(nsweb PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET nsweb PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(nsweb PRIVATE
    curl
    wslay
    mbedtls
    mbedcrypto
    mbedx509
)
target_link_directories(nsweb PRIVATE
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
)
target_link_options(nsweb PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(nsweb PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
    src/nsweb.cpp
    src/socket_fun.cpp
    src/tls_fun.cpp
    src/url_fun.cpp
)
